description: Manages user sessions, providing methods to start, set, get, check existence, remove, and clear session data. Also includes a method to check user roles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the PHP session if it hasn't been started already.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the session variable.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to store in the session variable.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the session variable.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: (Optional) The default value to return if the key does not exist.

methods.name: has
methods.description: Checks if a session variable exists.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the session variable.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the session variable.

methods.name: flash
methods.description: Sets or retrieves a flash message (a session variable that is automatically removed after being read).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the flash message.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Optional) The message to set. If null, retrieves the message.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all session variables and destroys the session.

methods.name: hasRole
methods.description: Checks if the logged-in user has a specific role.
